name: Stickman Golf HD
description:
Stickman Golf HD is the iPad version of our #1 iPhone game! Be Warned: VERY ADDICTIVE!! Previously the #1 iPad App in over 10 countries, including US, Canada, UK, Germany, France, and more...


What reviewers are saying:
--------------------------

"One of the best platforming games on the iPad. 5/5 Stars." -Gamepro.com

"As far as it goes, they can’t get any better than this." -Touchaholics.com

"Stick Golf is a total winner. Once you play it you'll be hooked." -Slapapp.com

"5/5 stars! I am not at all a golf fan but I can honestly say I loved this game. An addictive game!" -TouchReviews.net

"All I can say is that I love it!" -Appmodo.com

"You are gonna get addicted to the game." -AppReviewsOnline.com

"There’s something to be said for simplicity when it's well-executed." -JustAnotheriPhoneBlog.com


What users are saying:
--------------------------

"You need this app, you want this app, you cant handle this app! It is my reason for living. My brothers and i cant put it down, my brother's wife filed for divorce because he only plays stick golf, he doesnt even know it yet cuz he hasn't put the iphone down."

"One of the best pick up n play games for the iPhone. Simple but effective graphics and excellent game play.'"

"There are some great games out on the market today created by independent developers that don't receive the props they truly deserve..... Stick Golf is one of them"

"This is the best game I've ever played on the Iphone. This is super addicting and more challenging yet not impossible...... Keep the updates comin!!! 10 stars out of 5"

--------------------------

FEATURES:
- 144 Unique holes
- Unlockable achievements
- Play with wind for a more challenging round
- Open Feint integration
- Global and local high scores
- NEW COURSES will be added periodically!

Step up to the tee, and see if you got what it takes.

www.noodlecake.com
